name: WIP_FIFE_Game
summary: A work in progress Python RPG based on the FIFE engine
short_description:
This is the page of a work in progress RPG game I plan to create. It will be based on the fife engine and will be writen in Python...

Right now the game is only in planning stages, I will present some blueprints soon.

I need more developers to help me with this project (I can't do it all by myself) so if you want you can contact me at:
ishdaimah@gmail.com
